summary: This code imports necessary functions from two different modules, "log_utils" and "ies_optim_legacy". The "logger_print" function is imported to handle logging operations while the "*" symbol after "ies_optim_legacy" imports all functions present in that module. This suggests that these functions will be used for optimization tasks related to IES (Intelligent Energy Systems).
